idea-plugin.name: Elem CSS Class Support
idea-plugin.description:
Provides CSS class completion and navigation for the Elem PHP templating library.

Features

  • CSS Class Completion - Get autocomplete suggestions for CSS classes when typing in class: parameters
  • Go to Definition - Ctrl+Click on CSS class names to jump to their definitions in CSS files
  • Multi-class Support - Works with space-separated class names like 'btn btn-primary'

Supported Functions

Works with all Elem helper functions: div(), span(), p(), a(), button(), input(), form(), and more.

Usage

div(class: 'container')(
    h(1, class: 'title'),
    p(class: 'intro-text')
)
